nodes.text: Spero's Flight is a short story appearing in the June 1996 Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook, written by Peter M. Schweighofer for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The story tells of how Princess Leia Organa, while serving at the Alderaan consulate on Coruscant, engineers the Ho'Din Spero's escape from Imperial Intelligence after he is suspected of having ties to the Rebel Alliance.
